sources.title: Parade of the Planets
sources.description:
The heroes of the film - an astrophysicist, a locksmith, a salesman, an architect, a loader, a trolleybus driver - are called up for military training, which ends ahead of time. There is a strange pause in their life - no one knows where they are, no one is waiting for them, and they themselves can not rush anywhere. This short respite in a hurried and hectic life gives the heroes the opportunity to experience strong and very important feelings for them.

IMDb rating: 7.0

Year of production: 1984

Director: Vadim Abdrashitov
Screenwriter: Mindadze Alexander
Composer: Ganelin Vyacheslav
Cinematographer: Vladimir Shevcik
Artist-director: Alexander Tolkachev

–°ast: Sergey Shakurov, Sergey Nikonenko, Oleg Borisov, Alexey Zharkov, Peter Zaichenko, Alexander Pashutin, Boris Romanov, Boris Smorchkov, Marina Shimanskaya, Galina Shostko, Elena Mayorova, Nevolina Angelika

metadata.Plot: In a surreal puzzler, this story of a fantasy lived by a disparate group of men captures the visual imagination with its images and leaves a large question mark in the meantime. A rare astronomical phenomenon - the parade of planets - has a peculiar effect on several of the men.
metadata.Actors: Oleg Borisov, Liliya Gritsenko, Aleksey Zharkov
